argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | mattposvs.a | |- A = ( N Mat R ) |
| 2 |  | mattposvs.b | |- B = ( Base ` A ) |
| 3 |  | mattposvs.k | |- K = ( Base ` R ) |
| 4 |  | mattposvs.v | |- .x. = ( .s ` A ) |
| 5 | 1, 2 | #P_matrcl | |- ( Y e. B -> ( N e. Fin /\ R e. _V ) ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_simpld | |- ( Y e. B -> N e. Fin ) |
| 7 |  | #P_sqxpexg | |- ( N e. Fin -> ( N X. N ) e. _V ) |
| 8 | 6, 7 | #P_syl | |- ( Y e. B -> ( N X. N ) e. _V ) |
| 9 |  | #P_snex | |- { X } e. _V |
| 10 |  | #P_xpexg | |- ( ( ( N X. N ) e. _V /\ { X } e. _V ) -> ( ( N X. N ) X. { X } ) e. _V ) |
| 11 | 8, 9, 10 | #P_sylancl | |- ( Y e. B -> ( ( N X. N ) X. { X } ) e. _V ) |
| 12 |  | #P_oftpos | |- ( ( ( ( N X. N ) X. { X } ) e. _V /\ Y e. B ) -> tpos ( ( ( N X. N ) X. { X } ) oF ( .r ` R ) Y ) = ( tpos ( ( N X. N ) X. { X } ) oF ( .r ` R ) tpos Y ) ) |
| 13 | 11, 12 | #P_mpancom | |- ( Y e. B -> tpos ( ( ( N X. N ) X. { X } ) oF ( .r ` R ) Y ) = ( tpos ( ( N X. N ) X. { X } ) oF ( .r ` R ) tpos Y ) ) |
| 14 |  | #P_tposconst | |- tpos ( ( N X. N ) X. { X } ) = ( ( N X. N ) X. { X } ) |
| 15 | 14 | #P_oveq1i | |- ( tpos ( ( N X. N ) X. { X } ) oF ( .r ` R ) tpos Y ) = ( ( ( N X. N ) X. { X } ) oF ( .r ` R ) tpos Y ) |
| 16 | 13, 15 | #P_syl6eq | |- ( Y e. B -> tpos ( ( ( N X. N ) X. { X } ) oF ( .r ` R ) Y ) = ( ( ( N X. N ) X. { X } ) oF ( .r ` R ) tpos Y ) ) |
| 17 | 16 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( X e. K /\ Y e. B ) -> tpos ( ( ( N X. N ) X. { X } ) oF ( .r ` R ) Y ) = ( ( ( N X. N ) X. { X } ) oF ( .r ` R ) tpos Y ) ) |
| 18 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( .r ` R ) = ( .r ` R ) |
| 19 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( N X. N ) = ( N X. N ) |
| 20 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 18, 19 | #P_matvsca2 | |- ( ( X e. K /\ Y e. B ) -> ( X .x. Y ) = ( ( ( N X. N ) X. { X } ) oF ( .r ` R ) Y ) ) |
| 21 | 20 | #P_tposeqd | |- ( ( X e. K /\ Y e. B ) -> tpos ( X .x. Y ) = tpos ( ( ( N X. N ) X. { X } ) oF ( .r ` R ) Y ) ) |
| 22 | 1, 2 | #P_mattposcl | |- ( Y e. B -> tpos Y e. B ) |
| 23 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 18, 19 | #P_matvsca2 | |- ( ( X e. K /\ tpos Y e. B ) -> ( X .x. tpos Y ) = ( ( ( N X. N ) X. { X } ) oF ( .r ` R ) tpos Y ) ) |
| 24 | 22, 23 | #P_sylan2 | |- ( ( X e. K /\ Y e. B ) -> ( X .x. tpos Y ) = ( ( ( N X. N ) X. { X } ) oF ( .r ` R ) tpos Y ) ) |
| 25 | 17, 21, 24 | #P_3eqtr4d | |- ( ( X e. K /\ Y e. B ) -> tpos ( X .x. Y ) = ( X .x. tpos Y ) ) |
